Contact

Twitter · Tumblr · Github · Pinboard

If you wish to comment on a post, or contact Kyle, shoot him an email and he’ll get back to you within a day or two. He’s also available on Twitter @kyledreger. For the cool nerds, go ahead and open up an issue at kyledreger/feedback on GitHub.
